summary: A utility script that converts Versatile Stable Diffusion model checkpoints—including VAE, image and text UNet weights and scheduler settings—into the configuration and checkpoint format required by the Hugging Face Diffusers library, allowing the models to be loaded with VersatileDiffusionPipeline.
business_intent: Enable seamless migration of custom Versatile Diffusion models to the standard Diffusers ecosystem, simplifying distribution, deployment, and inference for downstream applications.
